title: Trump begins post-election push for NY criminal case dismissal
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's defense lawyers began their formal push to have his New York criminal case dismissed based on the election outcome.

title: Trans community braces for Trump White House
shortDescription: Donald Trump made gender identity a focus of his campaign, leaving many in the trans community worried for the future.

title: Donald Trump chooses Matthew Whitaker as NATO ambassador
shortDescription: Matthew Whitaker, who served briefly as interim attorney general during Trump's first term, got the nod as US ambassador to NATO.

title: Will Trump's 'mass deportations' disrupt Florida communities, economy?
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's pledge for massive deportations could target 1.1 million in Florida, rocking communities and the state's economy.

title: Putin, ascendant in Ukraine, eyes contours of a Trump peace deal
shortDescription: Putin said this month that any ceasefire deal should reflect the "realities" on the ground.

title: Prosecutors ask to delay Trump hush money sentencing | The Excerpt
shortDescription: How is the Biden administration addressing aid to Ukraine? Plus, Trump picks Linda McMahon to be education secretary. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Who is Trump's Education pick Linda McMahon?
shortDescription: WWE co-founder Linda McMahon was most recently the chair of a Trump-aligned think tank. Now she's Trump's pick to run the Department of Education.

title: Trump taps Lutnick for trade, Oz for Medicare, McMahon for schools
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said he will nominate Wall Street CEO Howard Lutnick as head of the Commerce Department and Linda McMahon as secretary of education.

title: Dating across parties on apps post-election
shortDescription: Fudging the truth on your dating app profile is not new, but now that has spread to hiding your political affiliation.

title: Migrant children could suffer most under Trump's plans, advocates say
shortDescription: Family separation, mass deportation and an end to DACA are among the threats to immigrant children that advocates fear Trump will bring in with him.

title: With a GOP trifecta, a new era of college oversight may be on its way
shortDescription: With the GOP set to take control of Congress and a staunch Trump ally slated to lead the Education Department, colleges may be in for lots of change.

title: How social media helped Trump return to the White House
shortDescription: Social media was used successfully to help the Trump campaign win big in 2024 and it’s expected to be used even more in his next administration

title: Who has Trump picked for his Cabinet so far? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump selected physician and TV star Dr. Mehmet Oz to serve as the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services administrator.

title: Donald Trump picks billionaire, WWE co-founder Linda McMahon to be education secretary
shortDescription: McMahon has remained a close ally of Trump's since serving in his first administration.

title: Trump's Cabinet picks are roiling Congress – including some Republicans
shortDescription: Controversial nominees like Matt Gaetz and Pete Hegseth are stretching GOP senators' willingness to abide by the incoming president.

title: Fabricated Trump post demeans MSNBC hosts after meeting | Fact check
shortDescription: The image is a fabrication that appeared to originate from a satirical account. There is no record of the post on Trump's Truth Social account.

title: No donations from Sephora to Trump campaign | Fact check
shortDescription: Some of Sephora's employees and their immediate family members donated to Trump – the company itself did not. It's illegal for corporations to do so.

title: Trump call to end birthright citizenship won't affect son | Fact check
shortDescription: The repeal would cover future births and require at least one parent to be a citizen when a child is born. Neither would affect Barron Trump.

title: Donald Trump's hush money case delayed
shortDescription: Prosecutors in Manhattan, New York, asked the judge in President-elect Donald Trump's hush money case for an indefinite delay.

title: Trump nominee RFK Jr. welcomed by GOP senators
shortDescription: As controversial nominees roil the Senate GOP, the former Democrat and vaccine skeptic is welcomed.

title: Trump allies fire 2026 warning shots for GOP Senate holdouts
shortDescription: Those close to the president-elect say senators who step out of line could face a tough 2026 primary. But senators say they aren't stressing yet.

title: Donald Trump picks Dr. Mehmet Oz to manage Medicaid and Medicare
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he will nominate television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz to serve as the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services Administrator.

title: No, Trump's election did not lead to grocery price cuts | Fact check
shortDescription: A satirical claim that grocery chains cut prices 4% in response to Trump winning the presidential election is circulating like it is authentic.
